# TELEGRAM BOT SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

## 1. Create Bot
1. Open Telegram and message @BotFather
2. Send: /newbot
3. Choose bot name (e.g., "CIAN Tracker")
4. Choose username (e.g., "cian_tracker_bot")
5. Copy the bot token (looks like: 123456789:ABCDEF...)

## 2. Get Chat ID
1. Start chat with your new bot
2. Send any message to the bot
3. Visit: https://api.telegram.org/bot<YOUR_BOT_TOKEN>/getUpdates
4. Find your chat ID in the response (usually negative number for groups)

## 3. Set Environment Variables
Add to your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc:

export TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN="123456789:ABCDEF..."
export TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID="123456789"

Then reload: source ~/.bashrc

## 4. Alternative: Create .env file
Create file '.env' in this directory:

TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=123456789:ABCDEF...
TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID=123456789

## 5. Test Bot
python -c "
from telegram_bot import TelegramBot
